DOC.brief_title: Surgery Photodynamic Therapy Treating Patients With Malignant Mesothelioma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine feasibility adjuvant photodynamic therapy large diffuser fiber patient malignant mesothelioma undergo surgery . - Compare result regimen patient historical control . - Determine toxic effect regimen patient . OUTLINE : This pilot study . Patients receive porfimer sodium IV 5-10 minute day 1 . Patients undergo pleurectomy pleuropneumonectomy follow intracavitary photodynamic therapy day 3 . Patients follow 1 month , every 4 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 20 patient accrue study within 3 year .
